SELECT DAILYCHECK_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS DAILYCHECK_SEQ FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO DAILYCHECK (DAILY_SEQ, USER_ID, DAILY_INTIME, DAILY_REGDATE) VALUES ('DAILYCHECK_' || TO_CHAR(DAILYCHECK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'FM000'), #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE DAILYCHECK SET DAILY_OUTTIME=CURRENT_DATE, DAILY_REGDATE=CURRENT_DATE WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND TRUNC(DAILY_REGDATE) = TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE)
mapper.select: SELECT dc.DAILY_SEQ, dc.USER_ID, u.USER_NAME, p.POSITIONS_NAME, r.RANKS_NAME, de.DEPT_NAME, dc.DAILY_INTIME, dc.DAILY_OUTTIME, dc.DAILY_STATUS, dc.DAILY_MODIFY, dc.DAILY_REGDATE FROM USERINFO u INNER JOIN DAILYCHECK dc ON u.USER_ID = dc.USER_ID INNER JOIN POSITIONS p ON u.POSITIONS_SEQ = p.POSITIONS_SEQ INNER JOIN RANKS r ON u.RANKS_SEQ = r.RANKS_SEQ INNER JOIN DEPT de ON u.DEPT_SEQ = de.DEPT_SEQ ORDER BY dc.DAILY_REGDATE DESC

SELECT USER_ID, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(DAILY_INTIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') < '09:00:00' AND TO_CHAR(DAILY_OUTTIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') >= '18:00:00' THEN '정상근무' WHEN TO_CHAR(DAILY_INTIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') < '09:00:00' AND TO_CHAR(DAILY_OUTTIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') < '18:00:00' THEN '조퇴' WHEN TO_CHAR(DAILY_INTIME, 'HH24') BETWEEN '12' AND '13' AND TO_CHAR(DAILY_OUTTIME, 'HH24') >= '17' THEN '조퇴' WHEN TO_CHAR(DAILY_INTIME, 'HH24') BETWEEN '12' AND '13' AND TO_CHAR(DAILY_OUTTIME, 'HH24') < '17' THEN '결근' WHEN TO_CHAR(DAILY_INTIME, 'HH24') < '12' AND (DAILY_OUTTIME - DAILY_INTIME) * 24 >= 5 THEN '조퇴' WHEN TO_CHAR(DAILY_INTIME, 'HH24') < '12' AND (DAILY_OUTTIME - DAILY_INTIME) * 24 < 5 THEN '결근' WHEN TO_CHAR(DAILY_INTIME, 'HH24') >= '13' AND (DAILY_OUTTIME - DAILY_INTIME) * 24 >= 4 THEN '지각' WHEN TO_CHAR(DAILY_INTIME, 'HH24') >= '13' AND (DAILY_OUTTIME - DAILY_INTIME) * 24 < 4 THEN '결근' ELSE '결근' END AS DAILY_STATUS FROM DAILYCHECK d WHERE DAILY_MODIFY = 'N' AND TRUNC(DAILY_REGDATE) = TRUNC(CURRENT_DATE)
